VLIB_L2_norm_i16

Detailed Description


Functions

VLIB_F32 VLIB_L2_norm_i16 (const uint16_t pData[], int32_t len)

Function Documentation

VLIB_F32 VLIB_L2_norm_i16 ( const uint16_t  pData[],
int32_t  len 
)

Description
This function implements L2 norm of a len dimentional vector of 16-bit values. The output is computed by taking the square root of the sum of squares of each value in the input array
Parameters:
[in] pData[] Array of data buffer of data type unsigned short (UQ16.0)
[in] len Length of the input array (SQ31.0)
Implementation Notes:
  • This code is compatible with C66x floating-point processors
  • pData buffer should be 8-byte aligned
Benchmarks:
See VLIB_Test_Report.html for cycle and memory information.
